posts.post_content: I like throwing this on the stack on top of my hellbent spells, really lets you get the full impact from cards like [Twinstrike](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Twinstrike) (a^ssuming you have the mana to make such a play)

Posted By: IshubarashI (7/7/2010 6:05:52 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
i dont think this saves you from discarding down to 7.  
  
the end step begins, all triggers and spells/abilities happen, then the cleanup step where you discard comes.. i guess if you cast this on your endstep, then get the cards back on your opponent's end step.  
  
but cast normally, you discard after the end step.
posts.html:
i dont think this saves you from discarding down to 7.

the end step begins, all triggers and spells/abilities happen, then the cleanup step where you discard comes.. i guess if you cast this on your endstep, then get the cards back on your opponent's end step.

but cast normally, you discard after the end step.
